scenes.background: Monica rolls her eyes and says, A bar party will just be a noisy mess.
scenes.description: Bars can be fun; lets try to make it enjoyable for everyone.

options.text: I think with the right planning, a bar can be fun and not too noisy.
options.analysis: You showed good perception and social skill by acknowledging the concern and proposing a solution, but motivation was lower.

options.text: Why don't we find a bar with a quieter atmosphere?
options.analysis: You showed empathy and consideration by proposing a compromise, but self-regulation was lower.

options.text: If noise is a concern, maybe a bar isn't the best option.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern, showing good perception and social skill, but empathy was lower.
